content.question: Given the situation illustrated in the graph and holding all other influences constant, which of the following policies will restore the macroeconomic equilibrium to full employment?

choices.label: A contractionary fiscal policy and an expansionary monetary policy
A contractionary fiscal policy and a contractionary monetary policy
An expansionary fiscal policy and a contractionary monetary policy
An expansionary fiscal policy and an expansionary monetary policy
An expansionary fiscal policy without monetary policy

content.answer: A contractionary fiscal policy and a contractionary monetary policy

topic.text: 5.1: Fiscal and Monetary Policy Actions in the Short Run
